document_title.reason: Large prominent text at top of document labeled 'Invoice' — matches schema synonyms 'title'/'document_type'. Located in top-center area.

vendor_name.reason: Top-left block directly under the document title lists the issuer name 'Craigs' Landscaping' — matches synonyms 'vendor','from','seller'.

vendor_address.reason: Multi-line address beneath vendor name in the header block ('123 Sierra Dr' and 'Palo Alto, CA 94028'). Location and proximity indicate vendor address.

vendor_phone.reason: Right-side header contact block shows a phone number '123-456-7890' next to vendor contact details; mapped to vendor phone (synonyms: phone, tel).

vendor_email.reason: Right-side header contact block contains an email 'craigslandscaping@email.com' adjacent to phone and website; mapped to vendor_email and lowercased.

vendor_website.reason: Right-side header contact block shows 'craigslandscaping.com' near other contact details; mapped to vendor_website (synonym: web/url). Normalized by prefixing http:// for clarity.

client_name.reason: Left-column blue block labeled 'Bill To' contains the recipient name 'Smith Enterprises' — matches synonyms 'Bill To','issued_to','client'.

client_address.reason: Address lines under 'Bill To' in the left blue block show '456 Sierra Dr' and 'Palo Alto, CA 94028'; mapped to billing address.

invoice_number.reason: Right side of the blue details block is labeled 'Invoice # 12345' — direct mapping to invoice identifier ('invoice_no', 'Invoice #').

terms.reason: Within the invoice details block the line 'Terms Net 30' indicates payment terms; mapped to 'terms' field (synonym: payment_terms).

invoice_date.reason: Invoice details block contains 'Invoice date 08/01/2024' — date normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

due_date.reason: Invoice details block contains 'Due date 08/31/2024' — date normalized to ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD).

items.reason: Tabular area under headers 'Product/Services', 'Qty/Hrs', 'Rate', 'Amount' contains two rows. Mapped each row to an item object; numeric fields normalized to numbers and currency symbol noted.

item_description.reason: Multiple line-item descriptions are present as an array in 'items'. The single-field 'item_description' is not applicable when using items[].

item_quantity.reason: Quantities are provided per-row in items[] ('3.4', '3'). The single 'item_quantity' field is not populated to avoid inventing a single representative value.

item_unit_price.reason: Unit prices are captured per-row in items[]. The generic 'item_unit_price' field is left null because multiple values exist in the table.

item_amount.reason: Line amounts are provided per-row in items[]. The single-field 'item_amount' is not used to avoid ambiguity.

subtotal.reason: Right-side summary shows 'Subtotal $650.00' below the items table — mapped to subtotal and normalized to numeric value without currency separators.

discount.reason: Summary line labeled 'Discount' shows '-$65.00'. Mapped to discount; normalized to negative numeric value -65.00 as shown.

tax_rate.reason: Summary line is labeled 'Tax 8.5%' indicating the tax rate. Normalized to numeric percent value 8.5 (percent).

tax_amount.reason: Tax monetary amount shown in summary as '$49.73' adjacent to the 'Tax 8.5%' label; normalized to numeric amount 49.73.

total.reason: Bottom-right bold summary line labeled 'Total' shows '$634.73' which is the final amount due; normalized to numeric 634.73.

currency.reason: Monetary values in the document use the dollar sign '$' across amounts; normalized to currency code 'USD'.

payment_instructions.reason: No explicit 'Pay To' or bank transfer/payment instruction block is present in this document image; field set to null per requirement to not invent values.

bank_name.reason: No bank name or 'Pay To' institution is visible in the provided document.

bank_account_name.reason: No account holder name or account name is visible in a payment block on this invoice.

bank_account_number.reason: No bank account number or IBAN is present in the document; left null to avoid invention.

notes.reason: No separate free-form 'Notes' or memo block is present in the visible area of this document image; nearby text are addresses and invoice details which have been mapped elsewhere.

document_page_number.reason: No page number or pagination visible on the provided single-page invoice; set to null.
